# Texas 2036 COVID-19 Resource Kit

This is the code repository for the [Texas 2036 COVID-19 Data Resource](https://texas2036.shinyapps.io/covid_tracker/)

![Texas 2036 COVID-19 Data Resource](https://texas-2036.github.io/covid-pages/images/trends_cover.png)

This app is built using `shiny`, an interactive data visualization library built in R that allows people to create powerful tools. To replicate our  product, you'll need to run the `app.R` file inside of [RStudio](https://rstudio.com).
